trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_009<tab>Greetings, adventurer. As part of the Rising celebration, we are currently preparing an exciting game for your enjoyment.
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_010<tab>It will take a little longer, however, and we ask for your patience in the meantime.
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_011<tab>Oh? You're the adventurer who helped with the bug infestation some years ago, are you not? It's a pleasure to see you again.

TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_012<tab>Lest you wonder, as part of the Rising celebration, we are currently preparing an exciting game for your enjoyment. It will take a little longer, however, and we ask for your patience in the meantime.
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_000<tab>Greetings, adventurer! Are you here to test your skills in the excitement of Kupo Kupo Adventure?
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_002<tab>Excellent, let's get you started at once! Please enjoy yourself!

TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_003<tab>Kupo Kupo Adventure is a glamour-generated game in which you control a moogle armed with a magicked rebounding ball, and do battle with hordes of fiends.

TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_004<tab>The game was apparently developed by a fun-loving engineer. I don't know the individual personally, I'm afraid, but it is my pleasure to attend to those who wish to play.
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_005<tab>If you have a spare moment, then by all means give it a try!
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_006<tab>A-About myself? Well, there isn't much to tell. I'm but an ordinary citizen of Ul'dah.

TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_007<tab>I had previously assisted the wandering minstrel for the Rising, and was asked to do so again. Suffice it to say I'm suitably compensated for my services.
TEXT_FESANV2023MINIGAME_00830_NONORA_000_008<tab>I haven't forgotten the time you helped us with the bug infestation. You did no less than save the celebration then, and we can't thank you enough!
